snippet: The United States Anti-Doping Agency is preparing to unveil a new report that includes witness testimony from top cyclists claiming that Lance Armstrong used performance-enhancing drugs.
abstract: United States Anti-Doping Agency is preparing to unveil a new report that includes witness testimony from top cyclists claiming that Lance Armstrong used performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: The United States Anti-Doping Agency is preparing to unveil a new report that includes witness testimony from top cyclists claiming that Lance Armstrong used performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.seo: Antidoping Agency Will Reveal Key Evidence in Lance Armstrong Case
headline.main: Report to Reveal Evidence in Armstrong Drug Case
headline.print_headline: Agency File Will Detail Armstrong Drug Case
